blog.title: Academy
blog.subtitle: Strategies, Tips & Insights for OnlyFans Creators.

cta.title: Ready for your own success?
cta.text: Apply now at Estelle Management and start your career.

process.title: Path to the Top
process.subtitle: Build your empire in three steps.

steps.title: Application & Audit
steps.desc: We analyze your potential. If you have that 'certain something', we develop a battle plan.

steps.title: Onboarding & Setup
steps.desc: Our team takes over. Tech, accounts, strategy. You get a complete management environment.

steps.title: Scaling
steps.desc: We turn up the traffic. 24/7 chatting, marketing, and optimization running at full speed.

items.q: Do I have to quit my job?
items.a: No. Our goal is to give you time. We do the hard work so you can manage both – until OnlyFans becomes your main income.
No. We work 100% performance-based. We invest our time and resources in you and only earn when you earn.
Absolutely. We use Geoblocking (blocking your country/city) and ensure no one from your private circle sees your content.

items.q: How fast will I see results?
items.a: With our strategy, most models see a significant revenue increase in the first month. The full effect usually kicks in after 3 months.
OnlyFans pays directly to your bank account. We invoice you monthly for our share. You always keep full control over your finances.
No. We love building new talent. Your personality and motivation are more important than a perfect portfolio or experience.
Yes, 100%. You retain all rights to your content. We only use it for marketing during our collaboration.

items.q: What do I need to start?
items.a: A smartphone with a good camera, internet access, and a valid ID for verification. We take care of strategy and tech.
You are self-employed. We recommend specialized tax advisors from our network, but filing is your responsibility.
We work with fair contracts. Collaboration is based on trust. We generally have short notice periods so both sides remain flexible.

about.title: About Estelle
about.headline: Redefining Management.
about.text1: Estelle was founded with a clear vision: To offer talents a stage that goes beyond content creation. We see creators as entrepreneurs.
about.text2: Our team of experts in marketing, law, and brand-building works in the background while you stand in the spotlight. Your vision is our mission.

whatWeDoPage.title: What We Do
whatWeDoPage.subtitle: We turn talent into an empire.
whatWeDoPage.introHeadline: Success on OnlyFans is no accident.
whatWeDoPage.introText: It is the result of data, psychology, and hard work. Most agencies just post pictures. We build businesses. We handle the entire business side – from fan acquisition to upselling – so you can focus fully on your content and your life.

services.title: 24/7 High-Performance Chatting
services.description: Our chatters are not assistants, they are sales pros. We reply within seconds, around the clock. Through psychologically optimized scripts, we build deep bonds with your fans and maximize the Lifetime Value (LTV) of every subscriber.

services.title: Viral Traffic & Funnels
services.description: Content is King, but Reach is Queen. We manage your presence on TikTok, Instagram, and Dating Apps with aggressive strategies. We funnel 'High-Net-Worth' users directly to you.

services.title: Account Audit & Optimization
services.description: We analyze your existing numbers mercilessly. PPV prices, welcome messages, pin structures – we find the revenue gaps currently costing you thousands and close them immediately.

whyUs.title: 100% Freedom
whyUs.description: You create the content, we do the rest. No stress with messages, no posting schedule. You enjoy your life.

whyUs.title: Data-Driven Growth
whyUs.description: We don't guess. We analyze click rates, retention, and conversion rates daily to increase your earnings week after week.

whyUs.title: Legal & Protection
whyUs.description: We automatically scan the web for leaks. Our legal team sends immediate DMCA takedowns to protect your content and brand.

whyUs.title: No Risk
whyUs.description: We work purely performance-based. We only earn money when you earn money. Your growth is our only motivation.

modelsPage.title: Our Models
modelsPage.subtitle: Exclusivity and Elegance. Discover the talents that trust Estelle.

card1.title: Growth & Scaling
card1.desc: Data-driven strategies to sustainably increase your reach and revenue.

card2.title: Protection & Privacy
card2.desc: We protect your content via DMCA takedowns and maintain your anonymity.

card3.title: Brand Management
card3.desc: Building an exclusive personal brand that binds fans long-term.

contact.title: Application
contact.subtitle: Ready for the next level? Fill out the form and we will get back to you soon.
contact.name: Name
contact.photoHelp: Please 4 photos: Face (Front, Side, Angle) & Full Body. Max 25MB.
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us briefly about yourself and your goals...
contact.confirmAdult: I confirm that I am at least 18 years old and agree to be contacted.
contact.privacy: By submitting, you agree that your data will be processed for contact purposes.
contact.successText: Thank you. We have received your application and will get back to you as soon as possible.

sections.title: EU Dispute Resolution
sections.content:
The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (ODR): https://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr/.
Our email address can be found above in the imprint.

sections.title: Dispute Resolution Proceedings
sections.content: We are not willing or obliged to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.

sections.title: Disclaimer
sections.content:
Contents: The contents of our pages were created with great care. However, we cannot assume any liability for the correctness, completeness, and topicality of the contents.

Links: Our offer contains links to external third-party websites over whose content we have no influence. Therefore, we cannot assume any liability for these external contents.

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.subtitle: Information on data protection
privacyPage.intro: The protection of your personal data is important to us. We process your data exclusively on the basis of the legal regulations (GDPR, TKG).

sections.title: 1. Responsible Body
sections.content:
Responsible for data processing on this website is:

Estelle Management
Marcel van Lier
Vor dem Falltor 11
46459 Rees
Germany

Email: contact@estelle-management.com

sections.title: 2. Data Collection on our Website
sections.content:
SSL or TLS encryption: This site uses SSL or TLS encryption for security reasons. You can recognize an encrypted connection by the fact that the address line of the browser changes from 'http://' to 'https://'.

Server Log Files: The provider of the pages automatically collects and stores information in so-called server log files, which your browser automatically transmits to us (browser type, time, IP address).

sections.title: 3. Cookies
sections.content: Our website partly uses so-called cookies. Cookies do not cause any damage to your computer and do not contain viruses. They serve to make our offer more user-friendly, effective, and secure.

sections.title: 4. Contact Form
sections.content: If you send us inquiries via the contact form, your details from the inquiry form, including the contact details you provided there, will be stored by us for the purpose of processing the inquiry and in case of follow-up questions. We will not pass on this data without your consent.

sections.title: 5. Your Rights
sections.content: You have the right to free information about your stored personal data, its origin and recipient and the purpose of the data processing as well as a right to correction, blocking or deletion of this data at any time. For this purpose, as well as for further questions on the subject of personal data, you can contact us at any time at the address given in the imprint.
